TranRunJLite
Class HysteresisControl

java.lang.Object
  TranRunJLite.TrjTask
      TranRunJLite.SISOFeedback
          TranRunJLite.HysteresisControl

public abstract class HysteresisControl
extends SISOFeedback

Hysteresis Controller for single-input, single-output systems. This class is used as an extension of the SISOFeedback class and implements a Hysteresid control algorithm. This class is also abstract -- to use it the user must 'extend' this class and define FindProcessValue() and PutActuationValue(double val) so the controller can get its input and know where to place its output.

Author:
William Burke
